amendment.description: An amendment numbered 44 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to eliminate funding for the Title 17 Loan Program and moves that funding to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for the Title 17 Innovative Technology Loan Guarantee Program by $55 million and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 274 (Roll no. 366).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A020) Failed by recorded vote: 145 - 274 (Roll no. 366).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
